original: 入山採藥得《太平經》、創太平道；「眾星億億，不若一日之明也；柱天群蚑行之言，不若國一賢良也」，自稱「大賢良師」。
text: Entering the mountain to collect medicines obtained the "Tai Ping Jing" and created the Tai Ping Tao; "The stars are billions and billions, it is not like a day; the words of the pillars and the crowd are not as good as the country.", claiming to be "the great wise teacher ".
